org.eclipse.e4.xwt
Class XWT

java.lang.Object
  org.eclipse.e4.xwt.XWT

public class XWT
extends java.lang.Object

XWT is the main class of the XWT framework. It provides most of the services in API.

Author:
jliu and yyang
